name: Eye of Nollyn
description:
Not all detectives are geniuses.

Not all of them are nice.

Not all of them are legal.

In the city Nollyn, where money is what counts and what rules, is the private eye, Vin Virosa. He returns from years of hiatus as he's requested a case investigation from the president of Wilsons Corporation, the electric power corporation of the city. But as the investigation continues, something doesn't seem right...

Meet your clients, solve cases you're commissioned to, and receive the pay you deserve.

Game Features


  • Intuitive Controls
    "Eye of Nollyn" features simple controls designed for players of varying expertise. whether you're an experienced veteran or new to the world of detective games, you'll find the controls intuitive and easy, ensuring an overall seamless and enjoyable gameplay experience.
  • Intriguing Storyline
    The game "Eye of Nollyn" features an intricate and delicate storyline with plot twists after another. Become Nollyn's private investigator and solve crime cases emerging from the city's dark, mysterious alleys.
  • Engaging Questions
    Test your reasoning with a unique combination of multiple-choice and short-answer questions in the game "Eye of Nollyn". Crafted to be challenging and yet fair, these questions will push your intellect without resorting to absurdity.
  • Bribery System
    Still scared to try out the game? In "Eye of Nollyn," players have the option to bribe NPCs to extract additional information that might help them solve mysteries. With strategic bribery, players can gain valuable insights, making the game accessible and engaging for all.
